rules_text:
When this creature enters, create a 2/2 white Peasant creature token, a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying, and a Clue token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Creature tokens you control have skulk. [i](They can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
Abilities of noncreature tokens you activate cost {1} less to activate.
